name: Feather Foot
description:
Imagine jumping from place to place, but with one leg.

Oh, and infinite friction.

...And not having body parts to break.

Okay, we have that down. Welcome to Feather Foot. A game that's basically that, except pushing it to the limits. Just because jumping is easy doesn't mean it can't make it harder.

But your job is to do it. Why?

Because you can.

Notes I guess:

-Yes, every section is possible. I've done all of them.

-Yes, the graphics are awful. I put nearly no effort into them.

-No, this isn't everything I can do with this concept. This is just me prototyping the idea.
